page.description: Example demonstrates creating a list of states that display a popup message when clicked.
page.discussion: The List of States example demonstrates how the ViewBox can be used to create a simplified list data that looks like a List Control but only implements a minimal amount of functionality. If you only need to display a list of scrollable data, consider using the ViewBox instead of a List control.

section.description: The List of States template example is loaded by clicking the Load Sample ViewBox link on the Home tab of the ViewBox Builder.
